title: [Urban Feature] Upload Simulation - use existing former Simulation as basis

content.raw:
Could it be possible to add a functionality to the upload Simulation, where an existing simulation can be used as the basis. The reloaded parameters could then be changed \(e.g. by only changeing the circuit/tunnel parameter\). A button could be added in the list of the existing simulation to open a new upload Simulation dialog with these parameters.

I know that it is really late, but if this would be possible it would be really helpful. It would reduce the risk that the final solution is uploaded with faulty parameters \(e.g. a wrong robotname\).
content.html:
Could it be possible to add a functionality to the upload Simulation, where an existing simulation can be used as the basis. The reloaded parameters could then be changed (e.g. by only changeing the circuit/tunnel parameter). A button could be added in the list of the existing simulation to open a new upload Simulation dialog with these parameters.

I know that it is really late, but if this would be possible it would be really helpful. It would reduce the risk that the final solution is uploaded with faulty parameters (e.g. a wrong robotname).
